channel.title: Troubleshooting on Jenkins X
channel.description: Recent content in Troubleshooting on Jenkins X

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: We have tried to collate common issues here with work arounds. If your issue isn’t listed here please let us know. Is Jenkins X Open Source? Yes! All of Jenkins X source code and artifacts are open source; either Apache or MIT and will always remain so! Is Jenkins X a fork of Jenkins? No! Jenkins X will always reuse whatever is in Jenkins Core and configure it to be as kubernetes native as possible.
